Container.Name: NodeRed-Official-Docker
Container.Overview: Node-RED is a visual tool for wiring the Internet of Things[br][br] Node-RED is a tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways.[br][br] See NodeRed.org and flows.nodered.org for more info. [br][br] NodeRed will run on port 1880.[br][br] This is the V1 release Docker from the Node Red team - I just created the template.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/data[/b] : in this path, Node Red will store it's configuration files. [b]15.SEP.2016:[/b]First template[br]
Container.Description: Node-RED is a visual tool for wiring the Internet of Things Node-RED is a tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways. See NodeRed.org and flows.nodered.org for more info. NodeRed will run on port 1880. This is the V1 release Docker from the Node Red team - I just created the template.
